author: BBC News
title: Ford boss Lisa Brankin warns against taxing electric cars
description: Ford's UK boss says it is "not the right time" to tax electric vehicles when demand has already stalled.
content:
Sales figures from car industry body, the Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT) show how far car makers have to go to reach the target.
Fully-electric vehicles made up around 22.4% of toâ€¦ [+991 chars]
